institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-Specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) Operating Rules/Article 1 (Purpose)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule establishes core standards for the development, management, and utilization of human resources suited to industry characteristics in accordance with the “Human Resources Development Committee Operation Regulations” (hereinafter referred to as *Operation Regulations) and provides industry-led competency-centered development. The purpose is to stipulate the matters necessary for industry-specific human resource development committees organized by industry sector in order to contribute to the realization of society. Revised 2019. 1. 2.
